screen.freecursor.title: FreeCursor
screen.freecursor.instruction: Cursor is now free! Click or press ESC to return to game
config.freecursor.title: FreeCursor Config
config.freecursor.simulate_f1.tooltip: Hide HUD elements when cursor is freed, just like pressing F1
config.freecursor.disable_blur.tooltip: Remove background blur when cursor is freed, restoring original blur when returning to game
